query_applied: ((fibromyalgia[Title/Abstract] OR fibromyalg*[Title/Abstract] OR "chronic widespread pain"[Title/Abstract] OR "chronic diffuse pain"[Title/Abstract] OR FM[Title/Abstract] OR fibromuscular pain[Title/Abstract]) AND (microbiome[Title/Abstract] OR microbiota[Title/Abstract] OR "gut microbiome"[Title/Abstract] OR "intestinal microbiome"[Title/Abstract] OR "gut microbiota"[Title/Abstract] OR "intestinal microflora"[Title/Abstract] OR metagenom*[Title/Abstract] OR "16S rRNA"[Title/Abstract] OR "shotgun sequencing"[Title/Abstract] OR "microbial diversity"[Title/Abstract]))
